content: शिशुः [शो-कु सन्वद्भावः द्वित्वम्; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 1. 20</ls>] {@--1@} A child, an infant; शिशुर्वा शिष्या वा <ls>U. 4. 11.</ls> {@--2@} The young of any animal (as a calf, puppy, fawn &c.); <ls>Ś. 1. 15</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">7. 14</ls>, <ls n="Ś. 7.">18.</ls> {@--3@} A boy under eight or sixteen years of age. {@--4@} A pupil, scholar.
